title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: * " Oh, Alva woods are boniiie, Tillicoultry liiUs are fair, But wlien I think o' the bonnie braes o' Menstrie, It mak's my heart aye sair." — Fairy Rhyme.

title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: " The feudal hatred of Montrose, and of the clans composing the strength of his armv, the vindictive resentment also of the Ogilvies for the destruction  of ' the bounie House of Airlie,' and that of the Stirlingshire cavaliers for that of Menstrie, doomed this magnificent pile to flames and ruin.

title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: The feudal hatred of Montrose, and of the clanscomposing the strength of his army, the vindictiveresentment also of the Ogilvies, for the destructionof " the Bonnie House of Airlie," and that of theStirlingshire cavaliers for that of Menstrie,1 doomedthis magnificent pile to flames and ruin.
